document_data.name: Putrefaction
document_data.mainbody: '''''Putrefaction''''' was an [[alteration]] [[spell]] that spoiled food and water and spread disease.
document_data.Effects: Over a specified area of effect, a matter of yards (meters) dependent on the power of the caster, the spell caused food to rot and water to spoil and could even taint [[holy water]]. Any people or creatures within the area were possibly afflicted with a flesh-rotting disease, similar to [[mummy rot]]. If left untreated, it proved fatal in a matter of months.
document_data.Casting: The casting of this spell required [[verbal]], [[somatic]], and [[material component]]s, which included a portion of rotten meat.
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
